taxonomicnotes: Notopterus notopterus is a very widespread species that most likely represents a species complex.
rationale: Notopterus notopterus is most likely a species complex (R. Britz, pers. comm.), despite the very wide range as currently accepted.  Until the taxonomic issue is resolved, the species is assessed as Least Concern.  Further work is required to understand the species taxonomy when a reevaluation is also necessary to assess the status of the species.
evaluator: Jha, B.R., Allen, D.J., Datta, N.C., Britz, R. & Dey, S.C.
